description: Authoritative registry of space agencies and their data endpoints for TRIZEL Monitor

agencies.name: National Aeronautics and Space Administration
agencies.status_notes: Multiple public raw data archives available

endpoints.name: JPL Small-Body Database API
endpoints.description: Computed orbital elements and physical parameters (not archival raw data)
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Real-time computed values, updated as orbital solutions are refined

endpoints.name: Planetary Data System - Small Bodies Node
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Archive release after mission data processing (typically 6-12 months post-observation)

agencies.name: European Space Agency
agencies.status_notes: Public archives available through ESA Science Archives

endpoints.name: ESA Science Archives
endpoints.description: Mission archives including Rosetta, Gaia, and other space science missions
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Proprietary period varies by mission (typically 6-12 months), then public release

agencies.name: Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency
agencies.status_notes: DARTS (Data ARchives and Transmission System) provides public access to mission data

endpoints.name: JAXA DARTS
endpoints.description: Archive of JAXA space science mission data including Hayabusa missions
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Public release after mission data validation (typically 6-12 months post-observation)

agencies.name: China National Space Administration
agencies.status_notes: Limited public raw data access. Most datasets require formal data request and institutional credentials. Monitoring official announcements and catalog updates.

endpoints.name: CNSA Official Announcements
endpoints.description: Official mission updates and announcements (monitoring only)
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Varies by mission; many datasets not publicly released or require formal request

agencies.name: Russian Federal Space Agency
agencies.status_notes: Limited public raw data infrastructure. Most archival data requires institutional access or formal agreements. Monitoring official channels for public releases.

endpoints.name: ROSCOSMOS Official Portal
endpoints.description: Official mission information and announcements (monitoring only)
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Varies by mission; most datasets not publicly accessible without institutional credentials

agencies.name: Minor Planet Center (IAU)
agencies.status_notes: Public access to astrometric observations and orbital elements

endpoints.name: MPC Observations Database
endpoints.description: Astrometric observations submitted by observatories worldwide
endpoints.delay_policy_default: Real-time publication of submitted observations after validation

status_definitions.Active: Publicly downloadable RAW datasets exist and are implemented in download system
status_definitions.Monitoring: Agency exists but raw download not implemented or not publicly accessible without credentials
status_definitions.Limited: Only catalogs/metadata or derived products available without authentication
